localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Base64.ai is a cloud API that can extract data, photos, and signatures from all types of documents. We have prebuilt models for IDs, driver licenses, passports, visas, invoices, and many more document types. The integration is only a single API call.
blogPost.body: Base64.ai is a cloud API that can extract data, photos, and signatures from all types of documents. We have prebuilt models for IDs, driver licenses, passports, visas, invoices, and many more document types. The integration is only a single API call.
blogPost.title: Base64.ai - Extract text, data, photos and more from all types of docs
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Base64.ai是一种云API，可以从所有类型的文档中提取数据、照片和签名。我们预建了ID、驾照、护照、签证、发票和更多文档类型的模型。集成只是一次API调用。
localize.tagline: 从所有类型的文档中提取文本、数据、照片等

localize.description: Base64.ai是一種雲API，可以從所有類型的文檔中提取數據、照片和簽名。我們預建了ID、駕照、護照、簽證、發票和更多文檔類型的模型。集成只是一次API調用。
localize.tagline: 從所有類型的文檔中提取文本、數據、照片等

previous.excerpt: This is an iOS Clubhouse Bio Builder. You get 70 supported fonts, a large text box editor, it's stupid easy to understand, and most importantly it's FREE!
previous.title: Clubhouse Bio Builder - Craft your bio and immediately get more followers

localize.description: 这是一款iOS会所生物生成器。你会得到70种支持的字体，一个大型文本框编辑器，它愚蠢的容易理解，最重要的是它是免费的!
localize.tagline: 制作你的简历，并立即获得更多的追随者。

localize.description: 這是一款iOS會所生物生成器。你會得到70種支持的字體，一個大型文本框編輯器，它愚蠢的容易理解，最重要的是它是免費的!
localize.tagline: 製作你的簡歷，並立即獲得更多的追隨者。

next.excerpt: Teams by CALA is now available. With Teams, users can collaborate on the clothing design and manufacturing processes within one platform, eliminating siloed conversations among the sometimes 20+ specialists that work to bring fashion collections to life.
next.title: CALA - Teams - How fashion brands run their business.

localize.description: CALA的团队现已上市。有了Teams，用户可以在一个平台上对服装设计和制造流程进行协作，消除了有时超过20名专家之间的孤立对话，他们的工作是将时尚系列变为现实。
CALA的團隊現已上市。有了Teams，用戶可以在一個平臺上對服裝設計和製造流程進行協作，消除了有時超過20名專家之間的孤立對話，他們的工作是將時尚系列變爲現實。
